entry.title: Finite monetary supply for Bitcoin
entry.summary: In an email exchange on April 1, 2014, Daryl Banttari inquired about BIP 420 to Bitcoin core developer and open-source evangelist Jeff Garzik. Banttari suggested that adding zero to a number results in the same number. Garzik agreed with this statement and added that multiplying both sides by zero always results in a true statement. Garzik is also associated with BitPay, Inc., a company that specializes in blockchain-based payment processing systems.
